topics.body:
Ugh; so watching the news on windows 10: short version is microsoft is going to have a *HARD* time trying to sell it cause there's no real reason to get it.  Microsoft did a bunch of performance improvements and that, but it's just not worth it to upgrade.  The only real reason why to spend that money to upgrade would be because chances are microsoft is probably going to push video game companies publishers to push windows 10 which probably isn't going to happen.

If you use windows 7 or windows 8 and you have no problems with it stick with it cause there's just not enough going on with windows 10 to justify getting it.

It's not bad, but it's not good enough to justify upgrading.


My guess is: it's going to be a massive flop because there's not enough justification currently for people to buy it.

"@Carcass Strife":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/5559dde263687222fa395100#post_5559dde263687222fa395100
[bq="Carcass Strife"]"@uc9":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/5559dd1d6368723dce9a3600#post_5559dd1d6368723dce9a3600
So, short version is, Windows 10 is shit?[/bq]
It's not shit; it's just not worth the money.


In the short run it's probably going to be a massive flop, but in the long run chances are when the price starts getting marked down people will upgrade just cause of the cheaper price.

topics.body:
"@Carcass Strife":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/5559fbd663687264e1976f00#post_5559fbd663687264e1976f00

Okay, I will tell you about it...

My actual username is taufan99, but I sometimes use atalarikt as my username. You can call me either.

But that's not the main point.

The main point is that....

[spoiler]...I used to dwell in the monstrosity known as "fluffy pony" since April until November 2014. At first, I didn't know what MLP is, instead, I was just a bored, autistic 14-year-old Indonesian boy who liked "sick" and "depraved" things, like, you know... gory stuff and whatnot. But then I grew up, and realized that what I did was, and remains the biggest mistake I've ever done in my life.[/spoiler]

But then I discovered MLP and a very bright sun rises after the dark, hollow night! Had it been not for MLP, [spoiler]I would have been forever haunted by fluffy pony.[/spoiler]
topics.author: 53b52d3263687264ad300300
